title: Survey 1
description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Suspendisse euismod, justo et eleifend congue, purus lectus congue massa, sit amet vestibulum risus augue a orci.

questions.question: Age Group
questions.script: if (!['a', 'b', 'c', 'd', 'e', 'f'].includes(ageGroup)) {console.log('Please select a valid option (a, b, c, d, e, or f).');} else {console.log('Thank you for your response.');}

questions.question: Trading Experience Level
questions.script: if (!['a', 'b', 'c', 'd'].includes(tradingExperienceLevel)) {console.log('Please select a valid option (a, b, c, or d).');} else {console.log('Thank you for your response.');}

questions.question: Which blockchain platforms have you used for cross-chain transactions? (Select all that apply)
questions.script: const validPlatforms = ['a', 'b', 'c', 'd', 'e', 'f', 'g']; if (!selectedPlatforms.every(platform => validPlatforms.includes(platform))) {console.log('Please select valid blockchain platforms.');} else {console.log('Thank you for your response.');}

questions.question: How often do you engage in cross-chain transactions?
questions.script: if (!['a', 'b', 'c', 'd', 'e'].includes(transactionFrequency)) {console.log('Please select a valid option (a, b, c, d, or e).');} else {console.log('Thank you for your response.');}

questions.question: On average, how long do your cross-chain transactions take to complete?
questions.script: if (!['a', 'b', 'c', 'd'].includes(transactionDuration)) {console.log('Please select a valid option (a, b, c, or d).');} else {console.log('Thank you for your response.');}

questions.question: Have you experienced any challenges with current bridging mechanisms? (Select all that apply)

options.name: Lack of support for certain tokens or chains

questions.script: const validChallenges = ['a', 'b', 'c', 'd', 'e', 'f']; if (!selectedChallenges.every(challenge => validChallenges.includes(challenge))) {console.log('Please select valid challenges.');} else {console.log('Thank you for your response.');}

questions.question: What factors are most important to you when choosing a platform for cross-chain transactions? (Top 2 in order of importance)
questions.script: const validRanking = ['1', '2', '3', '4', '5', '6']; if (!selectedFactors.every(rank => validRanking.includes(rank))) {console.log('Please provide a valid ranking for each factor.');} else {console.log('Thank you for your response.');}

questions.question: How likely are you to try a new decentralized exchange that offers faster and more efficient cross-chain transactions without traditional bridging mechanisms?
questions.script: if (!['a', 'b', 'c', 'd', 'e'].includes(decentralizedExchangeLikelihood)) {console.log('Please select a valid option (a, b, c, d, or e).');} else {console.log('Thank you for your response.');}

questions.question: Any additional comments or suggestions regarding your experience with cross-chain transactions and decentralized exchanges?
questions.script: if (additionalComments.trim() === '') {console.log('Please provide additional comments or suggestions.');} else {console.log('Thank you for your response.');}

title: Survey 2
description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Suspendisse euismod, justo et eleifend congue, purus lectus congue massa, sit amet vestibulum risus augue a orci.

questions.question: Which cryptocurrencies do you currently hold in your portfolio? (Select all that apply)
questions.script: const validCryptos = ['a', 'b', 'c', 'd', 'e', 'f', 'g', 'h']; if (!selectedCryptos.every(crypto => validCryptos.includes(crypto))) {console.log('Please select valid cryptocurrencies.');} else {console.log('Thank you for your response.');}

questions.question: How did you learn about cryptocurrency investments?
questions.script: if (learningSource.trim() === '') {console.log('Please provide details on how you learned about cryptocurrency investments.');} else {console.log('Thank you for your response.');}

questions.question: What percentage of your overall investment portfolio is allocated to cryptocurrencies?
questions.script: if (isNaN(cryptoAllocation) || cryptoAllocation < 0 || cryptoAllocation > 100) {console.log('Please enter a valid percentage between 0 and 100.');} else {console.log('Thank you for your response.');}

questions.question: Which investment strategy best describes your approach to cryptocurrencies?
questions.script: if (!['a', 'b', 'c', 'd'].includes(investmentStrategy)) {console.log('Please select a valid option (a, b, c, or d).');} else {console.log('Thank you for your response.');}

questions.question: What challenges have you encountered in managing your cryptocurrency portfolio? (Select all that apply)
questions.script: const validChallenges = ['a', 'b', 'c', 'd', 'e']; if (!selectedChallenges.every(challenge => validChallenges.includes(challenge))) {console.log('Please select valid challenges.');} else {console.log('Thank you for your response.');}

questions.question: What features do you consider essential in a cryptocurrency portfolio management tool?
questions.script: if (portfolioFeatures.trim() === '') {console.log('Please provide details on essential features in a cryptocurrency portfolio management tool.');} else {console.log('Thank you for your response.');}

questions.question: How satisfied are you with the current state of cryptocurrency regulations in your country?
questions.script: if (!['a', 'b', 'c', 'd', 'e'].includes(regulationSatisfaction)) {console.log('Please select a valid option (a, b, c, d, or e).');} else {console.log('Thank you for your response.');}

questions.question: Do you actively participate in any cryptocurrency communities or forums?
questions.script: if (!['a', 'b'].includes(cryptoCommunityParticipation)) {console.log('Please select a valid option (a or b).');} else {console.log('Thank you for your response.');}

questions.question: What topics or information would you like to see more coverage on in the cryptocurrency space?
questions.script: if (coveragePreferences.trim() === '') {console.log('Please provide topics or information you would like to see more coverage on in the cryptocurrency space.');} else {console.log('Thank you for your response.');}

questions.question: How likely are you to recommend a cryptocurrency investment platform to a friend or colleague?
questions.script: if (!['a', 'b', 'c', 'd', 'e'].includes(recommendationLikelihood)) {console.log('Please select a valid option (a, b, c, d, or e).');} else {console.log('Thank you for your response.');}

questions.question: Any additional comments or suggestions regarding your experience with cryptocurrency investments?
questions.script: if (additionalComments.trim() === '') {console.log('Please provide additional comments or suggestions.');} else {console.log('Thank you for your response.');}
